law.text:
Before a license or permit may be issued under this article to an employer to engage in an activity in which the employer may employ a covered employee, as defined in § 9-101 of the Labor and Employment Article, the employer shall file with the State Comptroller or local licensing board, as the case may be:
A certificate of compliance with the Maryland Workers' Compensation Act; or
The number of a workers' compensation insurance policy or binder.
